Testing Directory Path Links

This page tests various directory link scenarios:

  • directory-with-no-index (should be broken)
  • directory-with-no-index/ (should be broken)
  • directory-with-no-index/index (should be broken)
  • directory-with-index (should be broken)
  • directory-with-index/ (should be OK)
  • directory-with-index/index (should be OK)
  • directory-with-no-index-with-twin (should be OK)
  • directory-with-no-index-with-twin/ (should be broken)
  • directory-with-no-index-with-twin/index (should be broken)
